/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A bus and a car can be seen in the distance, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape and creating a lens flare effect in the image.
